marytts.tools.voiceimport
Class VoicePackager

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.voiceimport.VoiceImportComponent
      marytts.tools.voiceimport.VoicePackager
Direct Known Subclasses:
HMMVoicePackager
public class VoicePackager
extends VoiceImportComponent

Package all of the data files required for the voice in a zip file and generate a component file with the corresponding metadata. Also generate the voice config file and include it in the package. This package is put in MARYBASE/download.

This component does not install the voice! The Mary Component Installer must be run for that purpose.

Author:
steiner (based on VoiceInstaller)

getVoiceDataFiles

protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.io.File> getVoiceDataFiles()
Get the data files for this voice (which go into MARYBASE/lib/voices) and put them in a <property, File> Map so that they can be accessed individually by the corresponding property key, e.g. "WaveTimelineMaker.waveTimeline" → File("VOICE_DIR/mary/timeline_waves.mry")

TODO The way individual components provide access to their properties is a little patchy, so for now, this method is a little fragile!

Returns:
the file Map
